sentences.en: Commanding officers rave about the better class of recruits coming in.
sentences.cn: 指挥官们醉心于招收高质量的新兵进来.

sentences.en: Did you just say something about me puking at a rave?
sentences.cn: 你是不是说我在锐舞派对上呕吐那件事?

sentences.en: Do he rave about his mother just the same, poor fellow?
sentences.cn: 他还像从前那样痴说乱道地说他妈妈吗, 可怜的人?

sentences.en: He was still ranting and raving the next morning.
sentences.cn: 第二天上午他仍在大叫大嚷。

sentences.en: I am a great fan of rave music.
sentences.cn: 我是锐舞狂欢乐的狂热乐迷。

sentences.en: I don't rant and rave or throw tea cups.
sentences.cn: 我不会大喊大叫或摔茶杯。

sentences.en: I know I shall rave about everything.
sentences.cn: 我知道我对一切都会是欣喜若狂的.

sentences.en: In 1985 her first collection received rave reviews from Women's Wear Daily. Ever since, applause has never ceased.
sentences.cn: 1985年她的首款系列时装得到《女性时装日报》的高度评价.从那时起,赞赏之声就一直不绝于耳.

sentences.en: It's quite a good film, but it's nothing to rave about.
sentences.cn: 影片倒是好影片，但也不值得大肆吹捧。

sentences.en: Old faces and new talents are making it big on the rave scene.
sentences.cn: 新老面孔在这场狂欢中都大放异彩。

sentences.en: Sometimes I couldn't control my temper I'd rant and rave so, I didn't recognize myself.
sentences.cn: 我暴躁,我胡说, 我 已经 不是我自己了.

sentences.en: The drunkard began to rave again.
sentences.cn: 这酒鬼又开始胡言乱语了.

sentences.en: The play got rave praises in the local press.
sentences.cn: 该剧在当地报纸上得到过分的赞扬.

sentences.en: The play got rave reviews / notices in the papers.
sentences.cn: 该剧在报刊上受到热烈的好评.

sentences.en: The play received rave reviews from the critics.
sentences.cn: 这部剧得到了评论家的高度评价。

sentences.en: You can rant and rave at the fine, but you'll still have to pay it.
sentences.cn: 你闹也好, 骂也好,罚金还是得交.

words.tran_cn: 胡说的；疯狂的；非常漂亮的
说胡话的人；社交场常客；（英）狂欢作乐的人
咆哮；胡言乱语；热烈赞美

phrases.tran_cn: 对…倾倒；热情地谈论；激愤地说
哄动热烈的好评；狂热褒评

trans.tran_cn: 围栏，围板，（人、风、浪的）狂闹，怒吼，狂欢晚会，<俚>狂热入迷

trans.tran_en: to talk in an angry, uncontrolled, or crazy way

trans.tran_cn: 胡言乱语，说梦话，愤怒地说，咆哮，狂喜
